blinkdb_client.h File Reference blinkdb_client.h #include <string>#include <iostream>#include <unistd.h>#include <arpa/inet.h>#include <sys/socket.h>Include dependency graph for blinkdb_client.h:

Classes
class blinkdb_client
Detailed Description
Defines the blinkdb_client class for connecting to a BlinkDB server and sending requests.
This file provides a simple client interface that uses POSIX sockets to establish a TCP connection to a BlinkDB server, send requests, and receive responses.
